# Package Description

This package is intended to allow light analysis of the Fatality Analysis Reporting System (FARS). This package will provide a mapping tool for plotting accident rates of an individual state. The FARS census information is provided by the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA).

# Load the Needed Packages

```{r import libraries}
 library(fars)
 suppressWarnings(library(maps))
```
